The EU's Official Journal said the firms and utilities are helping to fund the illegitimate government of Gbagbo. The EU first imposed sanctions on Gbagbo and his backers in December after the November election that world powers and African neighbours say rival candidate Alassane Ouattara won. be a guest at the royal wedding Despite being a pop music king Simon Cowell says he won't be a guest at the royal wedding of Prince William, Duke of Cambridge and Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge . Talking on American morning TV the music mogul said: I haven't been invited.
